short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you when to berserk in a lichess arena tournament game using the power of statistics!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currently works for 1+0 and 3+0 games. The berserk icon will light up if you should berserk and not change if you shouldn't.
